name: ERC1538Delegate
description: ERC1538Delegate. Modern + commented solidity implementation of https://github.com/mudgen/transparent-contracts-erc1538/blob/master/contracts/ERC1538Delegate.sol by Nick Mudge 2018.

eventDecorators.name: CommitMessage
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when an ownership transfer request is accepted by the pending owner.

eventDecorators.name: FunctionUpdate
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when an ownership transfer request is accepted by the pending owner.

functionDecorators.name: updateContract
functionDecorators.description: Updates functions in a transparent contract. If the value of _delegate is zero then the functions specified in _functionSignatures are removed. If the value of _delegate is a delegate contract address then the functions specified in _functionSignatures will be delegated to that address.

parameterDecorators.name: _delegate
parameterDecorators.description: The address of a delegate contract to delegate to or zero to remove functions.

parameterDecorators.name: _functionSignatures
parameterDecorators.description: A list of function signatures listed one after the other.

parameterDecorators.name: _commitMessage
parameterDecorators.description: A short description of the change and why it is made This message is passed to the CommitMessage event.
